entries.text:
Life comes from the ocean. Now we live on the beach. Never knowing what we could find. If we ventured further.

This one I did with the beautiful colors of Till Gerhard. It is made from pieces of the flyer for his 'A Recurring Dream' exhibition at Feinkunst Kr√ºger.

It's my first image with a background. Also the first one I put into a frame.
This is how it looked like without the background.
